wikipedia_page.main: Eric Bell (13 February 1922 – 2004) was an English footballer who played in the Football League for Blackburn Rovers. He had previously played for Blyth Shipyard.

response: Eric Bell (born 1947) is an Irish musician; lead guitarist for Thin Lizzy.
Eric Bell may also refer to:
* Eric Bell (footballer, born 1929) (1929–2012), English football player
* Rico Bell (a.k.a. Eric Bellis), English artist and musician
